text: Ra Anumzamoka nunamuntia antahineraminka, kumitia atrenerantenka za'zatera omaninka nunamuntia antahineraminka, Kagraka'a kagifima zamagima hu'nana vaheku'ene Nagri nagimo'ma Jerusalemi kumate me'nesnige'za monora hunante vava hugahazema hunka hu'nana kumaku'ene kagesa nentahinka, ame hunka taza huo.
